title: Arab leaders warn Israel's actions threaten regional turmoil
description: Dozens of leaders and senior officials from Arab and Islamic countries warned on Sunday Israeli actions in Jerusalem and the occupied West Bank could worsen regional turmoil, as violence surges between Israel and the Palestinians.

title: Hope for earthquake survivors fades as Turkey arrests building developers
description: Hopes for survivors from two earthquakes that rocked Turkey on Monday are starting to fade as rescue efforts start to focus on recovering bodies.

title: Russia bombards cities amid grinding push in eastern Ukraine
description: Russian forces shelled Ukrainian cities Sunday amid a grinding push to seize more land in the east of the country, with officials in Kyiv saying that Moscow is having trouble launching its much-anticipated large-scale offensive there.

title: New Zealand cancels flights as deluge from Cyclone Gabrielle looms
description: New Zealand’s national carrier canceled dozens of flights Sunday as Aucklanders braced for a deluge from Cyclone Gabrielle, two weeks after a record-breaking storm swamped the nation’s largest city and killed four people.
